entry.p: While travelling in Europe a few weeks ago, I thought of a book I'd like to write:

blockquote.p: Don't Buy This Book, You Can Read It for Free on the Internet!
The Closing of the Copyright Era, the Open-Sourcing of the Book, and What it All Means for Readers, Writers, and Publishers

entry.p: Not that I'll have time to write it anytime soon...
